sentences.english: In hopes of fighting off the disease, he ordered unending prayer and parades of chanters through the streets.
sentences.chinese: 为了与病魔做斗争，教皇下令祈祷者沿街游行吟唱。

sentences.english: I was able to meet the person buried under the clenches of her illness.
sentences.chinese: 我可以遇到这么一些饱受病魔折磨的人。
喜欢瘫痪和病魔缠身的题材？

sentences.english: She looked as she had a dozen years ago, before the disease had begun.
sentences.chinese: 她看来就如同十几年前病魔尚未缠身时那样。

sentences.english: Can you imagine a woman with serious illness manage a website by herself?
sentences.chinese: 你能想象一个病魔缠身的妇女独自经营一个网站吗？

sentences.english: To pray for health, every pilgrim would incense and worship here.
sentences.chinese: 想祈求健康去除病魔的信徒们都要到这里烧香拜佛。

sentences.english: The young boy's parents said Jayla helped their son with his own battle with illness.
sentences.chinese: 男孩乔斯的父母称加伊拉帮他们的儿子与病魔斗争。

sentences.english: Disease cut Smith off in the best part of life.
sentences.chinese: 病魔使风华正茂的史密斯英年早逝。

sentences.english: It was the festive run up to Xmas and I was determined to keep his morale up.
sentences.chinese: 快到圣诞节时，我决定鼓舞他对抗病魔的士气。

sentences.english: His indefatigable spirit helped him to cope with his illness.
sentences.chinese: 他不屈不挠的精神帮助他对抗病魔。

sentences.english: "I, too, now know that I will be taken by this disease," he says.
sentences.chinese: “现在我也知道了，我将会被这个病魔带走，”他说。

sentences.english: Like his son, he always believed they would beat this.
sentences.chinese: 他像自己的儿子一样相信他们能够战胜病魔。

sentences.english: Will Minfei be able to overcome her sickness?
For eight years she fought against cancer, but in the end her sickness had the last word1.
sentences.chinese: 她与癌症抗争了八年，但最终还是输给了病魔。

definition: to resist/to make a stand and fight (against)
to leave one's mortal frame (idiom)/to die
the world/this world/the world of the living
